item.title: Moving On
item.description:
In Moving On, Simone Silvestroni recounts how he moved away from the Apple ecosystem.

I did it. Leaving the Apple garden for Linux has been easier than anticipated. A new era of personal freedom has finally started.

It’s a move I’ve been contemplating for some time. Like Simone, I use Linux at work daily so that the task wouldn’t be too much of a stretch, but I’m probably too lazy (or too old) to execute it.
